abstract: The union accuses Amazon of hypocrisy in a dispute over the Google book settlement on orphan books.
snippet: The union accuses Amazon of hypocrisy in a dispute over the Google book settlement on orphan books.
lead_paragraph: In response to Amazon’s filing in opposition to Google’s landmark settlement with publishers and authors, the Authors Guild, one of the parties to the settlement, fired back with a statement on its Web site late yesterday.

headline.main: Authors Guild Accuses Amazon of Hypocrisy in Google Filing

abstract: The union accuses Amazon of hypocrisy in a dispute over the Google book settlement on orphan books.
